Service Menu

Get your nails done for great mood. Simple pleasures can make your week, not just day.

    - Add Shellac                         +$10

    - Remove Shellac                         +$10

Delicate cuticle work, buffing, and shaping. To finish, a relaxing hand massage with cuticle oil treatment and a hot towel, topped off with the perfect paint. (40 min)

    - Add Shellac                             +$7

    - Remove Shellac                         +$10

If you want a more premium service. Our classic manicure – with an additional hand scrub and mask, add optional Shellac for a more longer-lasting look. (60 min)

    - Add Shellac                             +$15

    - Remove Shellac                         +$10

Our popular pedi – soak your feet in Salt /w Lemon or Orange, have you feet scrubbed with sugar and callouses treated with care. This is followed by a massage and hot towel. (40 min)

    - Add Shellac                             +$10

    - Remove Shellac                         +$10

Our popular pedi – soak your feet in Salt /w Lemon or Orange, have you feet scrubbed with sugar and callouses treated with care. This is followed by a massage and hot towel. (40 min)

    - Add Shellac                             +$10

    - Remove Shellac                         +$10

Treat yourself with this premium Instagram ready experience - our Classic Pedi done in our special Jelly treatment. Also includes a hot-stone massage and Paraffin treatment to moisturize your skin. (60 min)

Lashes can change it all. Try out styling and tinting your Lashes and see the difference. Click here for our full menu. (180 min)
book appointment

Gift Cards

Give the best gift possible for someone you love to treat. This can be firends, family and co-workers who have just made your life amazing and you want to let them know you appreciate their part in your life. We carry both physical and digital gift cards for your convenience.

Follow Us @sarang.nails
Follow Us

Don’t miss nail salon promotions, follow us for the latest in nail art designs

Want to know the secret of longer lasting nails?

Subscribe now and thank us later

See what others have to say about us on Google!
Join Our Team

Do you have a love of nail art, manis and pedis? Please send us an email at info@sarangnails.com telling us a bit about yourself. Oh…and attach your resume.

Reach out

Nail Salon Cleanliness & Safety

Opening during such uncertain times has meant we have built our processes around ensuring your safety while providing timely and quality service. We follow guidelines provided and updated by Toronto Public Health Body Safe Program. Our tools are never reused without thorough cleaning and all stations are thoughtfully spaced or separated with barriers that are cleaned regularly to provide a safe environment. We also use other industry training to further enhance safety at our location eg Barbicide Covid-19 course. 

See our rules
